name: Booglemarks
body:
# What is Booglemarks

This is a SIMBL plugin for Safari/WebKit. Access your [Google Bookmarks](http://www.google.com/bookmarks/) from main menu natively.

![how it looks](http://f.cl.ly/items/1y1m41402e162w2d1O1s/Screenshot.png)



# What it Does

* Autoload All Bookmarks from signed in Google Account
* Add or Edit page in Google Bookmarks
* Open Tagged Bookmarks in Tabs


# How to Install

* Install [SIMBL](http://www.culater.net/software/SIMBL/SIMBL.php)
* Copy unzipped [Booglemarks.bundle](http://cloud.github.com/downloads/badjeff/booglemarks/Booglemarks.bundle.zip) to ~/Library/Application Support/SIMBL/Plugins/
* Quit and open Safari
* Find the Booglemarks on Safari's main menu


# Is it Free

Yes, it is released under [MIT License](http://github.com/badjeff/booglemarks/blob/master/LICENSE)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
